content:
hey @T-libs! we have a meeting in about an hour, at 2021-05-12T21:00:00+02:00

Preliminary agenda: https://hackmd.io/5I-8nVxuSzCZrSz1AxVaSw
if possible, i would appreciate if there was some time to give asynchronous feedback on the charter. i'm not sure what the timeline looks like. is there a draft written down somewhere?
@BurntSushi i expect we'll have first draft after the charter meeting today. (which is after the libs meeting)
ah great, thanks! sorry for jumping the gun. :-)

@BurntSushi last meeting i asked if anyone had any input we should take into account while writing it. if you have any ideas or concerns already, i'd love to hear them (here or in the private channel or in DM, whatever works for you)
